attributes.action: approach HM the Queen and make Wootton Bassett "Royal" in recognition of the town's honour to our fallen servicemen
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The town of Wootton Bassett has given an amazing response to the fallen servicemen from Iraq and Afghanistan on their tragic repatriation to our country.  They do it out of respect, not for publicity or public opinion.  They are an inspiration and the Town deserves the "Royal" honourific.  Please pledge your support for this extraordinary honour.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
